Software Engineering.title: Personal Portfolio Website
Software Engineering.description: Build your professional portfolio website showcasing your projects, skills, and resume. Learn responsive design principles and deploy to GitHub Pages or Netlify. Perfect first project to establish your online presence.

Software Engineering.title: Todo List with Authentication
Software Engineering.description: Create a full-stack todo application with user registration, login, and personalized task lists. Implement CRUD operations, secure authentication with JWT, and deploy to a cloud platform like Heroku or Railway.

Software Engineering.title: E-commerce Platform
Software Engineering.description: Build a complete e-commerce store like Amazon with product listings, shopping cart, checkout flow, and payment integration using Stripe. Implement user reviews, search functionality, and order history tracking.

Software Engineering.title: REST API for Blog Platform
Software Engineering.description: Design and build a RESTful API for a blogging platform with endpoints for posts, comments, and users. Implement authentication, validation, error handling, and document your API with Swagger.

Software Engineering.title: Real-time Chat Application
Software Engineering.description: Create a real-time messaging app like Slack with features including multiple chat rooms, direct messages, typing indicators, online presence, file sharing, and message search. Use Redis for caching and session management.

Software Engineering.title: Task Management System (Trello Clone)
Software Engineering.description: Build a Trello-style project management tool with drag-and-drop task boards, real-time collaboration, task assignments, due dates, and team workspaces. Implement web sockets for live updates across users.

Software Engineering.title: API Gateway & Authentication Service
Software Engineering.description: Build a secure API gateway that handles authentication, authorization, rate limiting, and request routing for microservices. Implement OAuth 2.0 for third-party login (Google, GitHub) and JWT for session management.

Software Engineering.title: Microservices Architecture with Docker & Kubernetes
Software Engineering.description: Design and deploy a production-ready microservices architecture for an e-commerce platform with separate services for users, products, orders, and payments. Implement service discovery, load balancing, circuit breakers, and distributed tracing with Jaeger.

Backend Engineering.title: Todo List with Authentication
Backend Engineering.description: Create a full-stack todo application with user registration, login, and personalized task lists. Implement CRUD operations, secure authentication with JWT, and deploy to a cloud platform like Heroku or Railway.

Backend Engineering.title: REST API for Blog Platform
Backend Engineering.description: Design and build a RESTful API for a blogging platform with endpoints for posts, comments, and users. Implement authentication, validation, error handling, and document your API with Swagger.

Backend Engineering.title: Real-time Chat Application
Backend Engineering.description: Create a real-time messaging app like Slack with features including multiple chat rooms, direct messages, typing indicators, online presence, file sharing, and message search. Use Redis for caching and session management.

Backend Engineering.title: API Gateway & Authentication Service
Backend Engineering.description: Build a secure API gateway that handles authentication, authorization, rate limiting, and request routing for microservices. Implement OAuth 2.0 for third-party login (Google, GitHub) and JWT for session management.

Backend Engineering.title: Microservices Architecture with Docker & Kubernetes
Backend Engineering.description: Design and deploy a production-ready microservices architecture for an e-commerce platform with separate services for users, products, orders, and payments. Implement service discovery, load balancing, circuit breakers, and distributed tracing with Jaeger.

Frontend Engineering.title: Personal Portfolio Website
Frontend Engineering.description: Build your professional portfolio website showcasing your projects, skills, and resume. Learn responsive design principles and deploy to GitHub Pages or Netlify. Perfect first project to establish your online presence.

Frontend Engineering.title: Todo List with Authentication
Frontend Engineering.description: Create a full-stack todo application with user registration, login, and personalized task lists. Implement CRUD operations, secure authentication with JWT, and deploy to a cloud platform like Heroku or Railway.

Frontend Engineering.title: E-commerce Platform
Frontend Engineering.description: Build a complete e-commerce store like Amazon with product listings, shopping cart, checkout flow, and payment integration using Stripe. Implement user reviews, search functionality, and order history tracking.

Frontend Engineering.title: Real-time Chat Application
Frontend Engineering.description: Create a real-time messaging app like Slack with features including multiple chat rooms, direct messages, typing indicators, online presence, file sharing, and message search.

Frontend Engineering.title: Task Management System (Trello Clone)
Frontend Engineering.description: Build a Trello-style project management tool with drag-and-drop task boards, real-time collaboration, task assignments, due dates, and team workspaces.

Data Science.title: Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) Project
Data Science.description: Perform comprehensive exploratory data analysis on a real-world dataset (like Titanic or House Prices). Learn data cleaning, visualization techniques, statistical analysis, and present actionable insights through a detailed Jupyter notebook.

Data Science.title: Customer Segmentation with K-Means
Data Science.description: Analyze customer purchase data to identify distinct customer segments using K-Means clustering. Apply RFM (Recency, Frequency, Monetary) analysis to create targeted marketing strategies for an e-commerce business.

Data Science.title: House Price Prediction Model
Data Science.description: Build a regression model to predict house prices based on features like location, size, and amenities. Learn feature engineering, handling missing data, model evaluation with RMSE, and hyperparameter tuning.

Data Science.title: Customer Churn Prediction
Data Science.description: Build a classification model to predict which customers are likely to churn for a telecom or SaaS company. Handle imbalanced datasets using SMOTE, evaluate with precision/recall/F1, and use SHAP for model interpretation.

Data Science.title: Sales Forecasting with Time Series
Data Science.description: Build a time series forecasting model to predict future sales for a retail business. Use techniques like ARIMA, SARIMA, and Facebook Prophet. Account for seasonality, trends, and external factors like holidays.

Data Science.title: Recommender System (Netflix-style)
Data Science.description: Build a movie recommendation system using collaborative filtering and content-based approaches. Implement techniques like SVD, KNN, and hybrid models. Evaluate with metrics like RMSE and precision@k.

Data Science.title: Image Classification with CNNs
Data Science.description: Develop a deep learning image classifier using Convolutional Neural Networks. Use transfer learning with pre-trained models like ResNet or VGG16. Deploy the model as a REST API for real-time predictions on platforms like AWS or Google Cloud.

Data Science.title: NLP Sentiment Analysis System
Data Science.description: Build a sentiment analysis system for product reviews or social media posts. Fine-tune BERT or use GPT models from Hugging Face. Create a web interface for real-time sentiment prediction and deploy with FastAPI.

Data Analytics.title: Sales Dashboard in Excel
Data Analytics.description: Build an interactive sales dashboard in Excel using pivot tables, VLOOKUP, and charts. Track monthly revenue, top-selling products, and regional performance. Learn data cleaning and conditional formatting to highlight key insights.

Data Analytics.title: SQL Data Analysis Project
Data Analytics.description: Analyze an e-commerce database to answer business questions: What are the top-selling products? Which customers generate the most revenue? Practice writing complex SQL queries with JOINs, window functions, and CTEs.

Data Analytics.title: Power BI/Tableau Dashboard
Data Analytics.description: Create an interactive business intelligence dashboard for a retail company showing sales trends, customer demographics, and product performance. Connect to multiple data sources and build drill-down capabilities.

Data Analytics.title: Customer Cohort Analysis
Data Analytics.description: Perform cohort analysis on customer data to understand retention patterns and lifetime value. Visualize cohort retention curves, identify churn patterns, and recommend strategies to improve customer loyalty for a SaaS business.

Data Analytics.title: A/B Testing Analysis Framework
Data Analytics.description: Design and analyze A/B tests to optimize website conversion rates or app features. Calculate statistical significance, confidence intervals, and sample sizes. Present results with clear visualizations and actionable recommendations.

Data Analytics.title: Marketing Attribution Model
Data Analytics.description: Build a multi-touch attribution model to understand which marketing channels drive conversions. Analyze customer journey data, compare first-touch vs last-touch vs linear attribution, and optimize marketing spend allocation.

Data Analytics.title: Real-time Analytics Dashboard
Data Analytics.description: Build an end-to-end real-time analytics pipeline for streaming data. Ingest data from Kafka, process with Spark Streaming, cache with Redis, and visualize in a live dashboard. Monitor website traffic, user behavior, or IoT sensor data.

Machine Learning.title: Customer Segmentation with K-Means
Machine Learning.description: Analyze customer purchase data to identify distinct customer segments using K-Means clustering. Apply RFM (Recency, Frequency, Monetary) analysis to create targeted marketing strategies for an e-commerce business.

Machine Learning.title: House Price Prediction Model
Machine Learning.description: Build a regression model to predict house prices based on features like location, size, and amenities. Learn feature engineering, handling missing data, model evaluation with RMSE, and hyperparameter tuning.

Machine Learning.title: Customer Churn Prediction
Machine Learning.description: Build a classification model to predict which customers are likely to churn for a telecom or SaaS company. Handle imbalanced datasets using SMOTE, evaluate with precision/recall/F1, and use SHAP for model interpretation.

Machine Learning.title: Recommender System (Netflix-style)
Machine Learning.description: Build a movie recommendation system using collaborative filtering and content-based approaches. Implement techniques like SVD, KNN, and hybrid models. Evaluate with metrics like RMSE and precision@k.

Machine Learning.title: Image Classification with CNNs
Machine Learning.description: Develop a deep learning image classifier using Convolutional Neural Networks. Use transfer learning with pre-trained models like ResNet or VGG16. Deploy the model as a REST API for real-time predictions on platforms like AWS or Google Cloud.

Machine Learning.title: NLP Sentiment Analysis System
Machine Learning.description: Build a sentiment analysis system for product reviews or social media posts. Fine-tune BERT or use GPT models from Hugging Face. Create a web interface for real-time sentiment prediction and deploy with FastAPI.

Machine Learning.title: AI-Powered Content Moderation System
Machine Learning.description: Build a multi-modal moderation system that detects and blocks inappropriate/violent content in videos by analyzing frames (vision models) and audio (NLP/ASR). Include score thresholding, human-in-the-loop review, audit logging, and a deployable API service.

DevOps & Cloud Computing.title: Dockerize a Web Application
DevOps & Cloud Computing.description: Learn containerization by Dockerizing a full-stack web application with frontend, backend, and database. Create Dockerfiles, use docker-compose for multi-container setup, and understand container networking and volumes.

DevOps & Cloud Computing.title: Automated Deployment with GitHub Actions
DevOps & Cloud Computing.description: Set up a CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions to automatically test, build, and deploy your application on every push to main branch. Deploy to cloud platforms like AWS EC2, Heroku, or Railway.

DevOps & Cloud Computing.title: Infrastructure as Code with Terraform
DevOps & Cloud Computing.description: Automate AWS infrastructure provisioning using Terraform. Create EC2 instances, VPCs, security groups, S3 buckets, and RDS databases with code. Learn state management and destroy/recreate infrastructure safely.

DevOps & Cloud Computing.title: Monitoring & Logging Stack
DevOps & Cloud Computing.description: Build a complete observability stack with Prometheus for metrics, Grafana for visualization, and ELK (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana) for log management. Set up alerts for critical metrics and create custom dashboards.

DevOps & Cloud Computing.title: Complete CI/CD Pipeline with Jenkins
DevOps & Cloud Computing.description: Build an end-to-end CI/CD pipeline that automatically runs tests, builds Docker images, scans for security vulnerabilities, and deploys to Kubernetes. Implement blue-green or canary deployments for zero-downtime releases.

DevOps & Cloud Computing.title: Kubernetes Deployment & Management
DevOps & Cloud Computing.description: Deploy and manage applications on Kubernetes. Learn pods, services, deployments, config maps, secrets, persistent volumes, and ingress controllers. Use Helm charts for package management and implement auto-scaling.

DevOps & Cloud Computing.title: Multi-Cloud Infrastructure with Terraform
DevOps & Cloud Computing.description: Design and deploy a production-grade multi-cloud infrastructure across AWS, Azure, and GCP. Implement disaster recovery, high availability, automated failover, cost optimization, and unified monitoring across cloud providers.
